summary:
it's a simple mod that change the valors of radius light:
<br/>magic skills to 4000 radius. original it's 512.
<br/>vanilla firecamps 512 or 912 to 9000 max, 1500 minimum light radius.
descriptionHtml:
please if you can help either with a dollar, that help me to escape from my Dictatorial country[url=https://paypal.me/frikiarte]
PayPal.Me/frikiarte
[/url]
If you just want a bigger radius torch then seek in the optional files for Torch1024 x2, torch2048 x4 or torch3000 x6. Good Day!

SOON VER 1.03:
NOW i have a good Environment mod engine ("Buenas Noches GoodNights and Days") now i can proced to reapair all broken lights.

VER 1.02
WEEEEE! I CAN! I CAN! I CAN! ALL LIGHTS CURE, FOR NOW 7 INTERIOR LIGHTS ARE BANNED FOR SECURITY! BUT WHEN I HAVE SOME TIME PUT SOME LIGHTS IN THAT PLACES!

CHANGES:

NEW MOD"Buenas Noches GoodNights" for this kind of ilumination i dont have other election to create a special mod for nights, the color of the light troll me each time that i test this mod.  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85748?    <<<<--------  very good idea!

torch cure!
strange lights in riften cure
excesive lights in interior spots banned!
camp fires in 7 interiors banned for security reason for now ;(
color for landscape are too close to reality no more antro lights or pubs lights!


THE ONLY'S MODS USED:

REALISTIC WATHER TWO
BUENAS NOCHES GOODNIGHTS
AND THIS MOD

thanks for playing!

FOR NOW WE ARE CURING ALL REDS COLORS AND PROBLEMS WITH POWER OF LIGHT.

we are working now starting over cero, without others mods, for now, the bounce lights... thats light with no have sense are eliminated for version 1.02. we hope restructuring all light only with the torchs, chandlers and streets chandlers, bonfires and any real thing that truly emitted light.
Bounce light banned.

Parch 1.01:

radius of torch of 6000 to 3000
emitted ligh of 1.3500 (power) to 2.500 (moar)
Color Black Orange

parch 1.00
it's a simple mod that change the valors of radius light:
<br/>magic skills to 4000 radius. original it's 512.
<br/>vanilla firecamps 512 or 912 to 9000 max, 1500 minimum light radius. 
the radius of torch of 512 to 6000 but a red light.
no much more.

please comment i am need to know if the esp it's working!
